name: NSFW Sticker Pack Hub
tagline: The largest collection of NSFW Telegram sticker packs
description: NSFW Sticker Pack Hub curates and shares the best NSFW sticker packs available on Telegram. From anime-style to realistic, the channel covers all types of adult stickers. Each post includes a direct link to add the sticker pack, a preview of the stickers, and the pack's theme/category. The channel regularly updates with new packs and removes dead links.
cons: Some packs get removed by Telegram
